name: Lego Charts for Excel
short_description:
Using a sequence of Open Source CAD/CAM and graphics tools, integrated through Excel macro code, "Lego Charts" extends the idea of the Excel 3-D bar chart. It allows the placement, shapes and colours of the bars to represent further dimensions to the data. The chart is presented as a photo-realistic model apparently constructed out of LEGO® [1] bricks.

The downloaded package consists of an Excel template to create the charts, an extensive installation and user guide, and two fully-worked samples. Creating eye-catching Lego Charts is easy, fun, and rewarding!

Platform: Windows 32 bit (XP onwards) with Microsoft Excel 2003 or later.

For more information about Lego Charts, and how to install the package, please see the file README.txt on the the FIles page.

---
[1] LEGO® and the LEGO logo are registered trademarks of The Lego Group, which does not sponsor, endorse, or authorize this software package or web page.
summary: Plot Excel data as photo-realistic 3D LEGO® models
